prompt_prefix:
SQL Schema:
create table public.player (
  player_id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  username character varying not null default 'user'::character varying,
  health real not null default '10'::real,
  sanity real not null default '10'::real,
  birthday date null,
  constraint player_pkey primary key (player_id),
  constraint player_username_key unique (username)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;

create table public.item (
  item_id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  name character varying not null default 'itemx'::character varying,
  description character varying null,
  constraint item_pkey primary key (item_id),
  constraint item_item_id_fkey foreign KEY (item_id) references player (player_id)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;

create table public.item_owner (
  owner_id bigint not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  item_id bigint null,
  id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  constraint item_owner_pkey primary key (id),
  constraint item_owner_item_id_fkey foreign KEY (item_id) references item (item_id),
  constraint item_owner_owner_id_fkey foreign KEY (owner_id) references player (player_id)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;

create table public.room (
  room_id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  name character varying not null,
  description character varying not null,
  lights_on boolean not null default true,
  constraint room_pkey primary key (room_id)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;

create table public.ghost (
  ghost_id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  name character varying null,
  favorite_food character varying null,
  sanity_attack_power real not null default '1'::real,
  constraint ghost_pkey primary key (ghost_id)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;

create table public.monster (
  monster_id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  name character varying not null default 'zombie'::character varying,
  health real null,
  attack_power real not null default '5'::real,
  defense_power real null,
  constraint monster_pkey primary key (monster_id)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;

create table public.ability (
  ability_id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  name character varying not null,
  description character varying not null,
  danger_level integer not null,
  constraint ability_pkey primary key (ability_id)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;

create table public.monster_ability (
  monster_id bigint not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  ability_id bigint null,
  id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  constraint monster_ability_pkey primary key (id),
  constraint monster_ability_ability_id_fkey foreign KEY (ability_id) references ability (ability_id),
  constraint monster_ability_monster_id_fkey foreign KEY (monster_id) references monster (monster_id)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;

create table public.room_belongings (
  room_id bigint not null,
  created_at timestamp with time zone not null default now(),
  player_id bigint null,
  item_id bigint null,
  monster_id bigint null,
  ghost_id bigint null,
  id bigint generated by default as identity not null,
  constraint room_belongings_pkey primary key (id),
  constraint room_belongings_ghost_id_fkey foreign KEY (ghost_id) references ghost (ghost_id),
  constraint room_belongings_item_id_fkey foreign KEY (item_id) references item (item_id),
  constraint room_belongings_monster_id_fkey foreign KEY (monster_id) references monster (monster_id),
  constraint room_belongings_player_id_fkey foreign KEY (player_id) references player (player_id),
  constraint room_belongings_room_id_fkey foreign KEY (room_id) references room (room_id)
) TABLESPACE pg_default;


Example question: In which room is the Amulet of Wisdom?
Example SQL:
```sql
SELECT r.room_id, r.name
FROM public.room r
JOIN public.room_belongings rb ON r.room_id = rb.room_id
JOIN public.item i ON rb.item_id = i.item_id
WHERE i.name = 'Amulet of Wisdom';
```
Now answer this question in this format: Give me a sqlite select statement that answers the question. Only respond with sqlite syntax. If there is an error do not explain it!

questionResults.question: Which players have items
questionResults.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT p.player_id, p.username
FROM player p
JOIN item_owner io ON p.player_id = io.owner_id
WHERE io.item_id IS NOT NULL;

questionResults.question: Which room as multiple monsters in it?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT r.room_id, r.name
FROM room r
JOIN room_belongings rb ON r.room_id = rb.room_id
JOIN (SELECT room_id, COUNT(monster_id) as monster_count
      FROM room_belongings
      WHERE monster_id IS NOT NULL
      GROUP BY room_id
      HAVING COUNT(monster_id) > 1) rm ON r.room_id = rm.room_id;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: The room with multiple monsters is the Dungeon.

questionResults.question: Which of the monsters has more attack power?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT name 
FROM public.monster 
ORDER BY attack_power DESC 
LIMIT 1;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: The Ice Serpent has more attack power.

questionResults.question: Which rooms still have their lights turned on?
questionResults.friendlyResponse: The Ice Serpent has more attack power.
questionResults.error:
operator does not exist: boolean = integer
LINE 4: WHERE r.lights_on = 1;
                          ^
HINT:  No operator matches the given name and argument types. You might need to add explicit type casts.

questionResults.question: What are all the rooms that currently have players in them?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT r.room_id, r.name
FROM room r
JOIN room_belongings rb ON r.room_id = rb.room_id
WHERE rb.player_id IS NOT NULL;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: Players are in the Grand Hall, Library, and Servants’ Quarters.

questionResults.question: Which items still haven't been collected by players yet?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT i.item_id, i.name
FROM item i
LEFT JOIN item_owner io ON i.item_id = io.item_id
WHERE io.owner_id IS NULL;
questionResults.queryRawResponse: [(5, 'Potion of Energy'), (4, 'Amulet of Wisdom'), (3, 'Boots of Speed')]
questionResults.friendlyResponse: Sure! The items still uncollected are the Potion of Energy, Amulet of Wisdom, and Boots of Speed.

questionResults.question: Which ability has the highest danger level?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT ab.ability_id, ab.name
FROM ability ab
ORDER BY ab.danger_level DESC
LIMIT 1;
questionResults.friendlyResponse: Fire Breath has the highest danger level.

questionResults.question: Which room has nothing in it?
questionResults.sql:
SELECT r.room_id, r.name
FROM room r
LEFT JOIN room_belongings rb ON r.room_id = rb.room_id
WHERE rb.id IS NULL;
